coolq_token: Coolq-http-api access token, leave blank for no token
proxy: Proxy URL, leave blank for no proxy, e.g. http://localhost:1080

push_text.message_format:
【Discord <user_display_name> <type>】
正文：<content>
附件：<attachment>
频道：<server_name> #<channel_name>
时间：<time> <timezone>
push_text.user_dynamic_format:
【Discord <user_display_name> <type>】
变更前：<before>
变更后：<after>
服务器：<server_name>
时间：<time> <timezone>
